name: Elemental Runes
description:
STORY

Elemental Runes is a 2D action-adventure platformer. Players must use multiple abilities that are given to them from the elemental runes to defeat the monsters they encounter. After completing each level, they will encounter the guardian that protects the area. Once the player collects all the runes, they will challenge the guardian that kidnapped Canis Canidae.

THE GAME

  • 4 playable elemental levels
  • 12 different skills
  • 12 unique minions w/ skills
  • 4 elemental guardians (mini-bosses)
  • 1  scary amphibious reptile

SKILLS

Elemental attacks are based on the type of stone. There is a primary attack move and a secondary utility move.

  • Air Stone: 
    • Primary: Air Wave
    • Secondary: Float
  • Earth Stone 
    • Primary: Earth Spike
    • Secondary: Earth Wall
  • Water Stone
    • Primary: Water Jet
    • Secondary: Restoration (healing ability)
  • Fire
    • Primary: Fireball
    • Secondary: Explosion
  • Light
    • Primary: Light Beam
    • Secondary: Flash
  • Dark
    • Primary: Sonic Wave
    • Secondary: Teleport

THE TEAM

Music: Aaron L.
